• community asset management experience
  • roles you’ll recruit in future

components.name: AfWrEq
components.title: Help with skills and resources
components.content:
We'll be assessing how you have considered the management requirements of your project.

This includes the steps you're taking to make sure your organisation has the right capacity and resource to run the asset sustainably.

You need to demonstrate you have considered succession planning for your organisation’s staff and trustees.

If you're planning to recruit staff or volunteers to manage and run the asset and its services, provide an overview of these plans.

You can use your business plan to provide information that supports your answers.

components.name: XXGyzn
components.title: Describe any relevant experience you have delivering similar projects or running an asset

components.title: Help with skills and resources

components.name: yHXVSA
components.title: Tells us about the roles you'll recruit
components.hint:
These should be positions which will help you effectively run the asset during community ownership.

Include the:

  • role
  • main responsibilities

    • You can use your business plan to provide evidence to support your answers.
